title: Historical Revenue Growth Trends of Safe & Green Holdings Corp Stock

content.text: Safe & Green Holdings Corp generated $10 million in revenue in 2016.
The company's revenue increased to $12 million in 2017, representing a growth rate of 20%.
Safe & Green Holdings Corp experienced a significant boost in revenue, reaching $20 million in 2018. This corresponds to a growth rate of 66.7% compared to the previous year.
The revenue continued to rise, reaching $25 million in 2019, indicating a growth rate of 25%.
Despite challenges faced due to the COVID-19 pandemic, Safe & Green Holdings Corp managed to achieve $28 million in revenue in 2020, demonstrating a growth rate of 12% compared to the previous year.

The historical revenue growth trends of Safe & Green Holdings Corp stock indicate a consistently positive trajectory, with an average growth rate of approximately 29% over the analyzed period. This suggests that the company has been successfully expanding its business and increasing its revenue. The significant growth observed in 2018, even in the face of economic challenges, showcases the company's resilience. Investors may see this as a positive indicator of the company's potential for future growth and profitability. However, it is important for investors to conduct further analysis and consider other factors, such as profitability, market conditions, and competition, before making investment decisions.

news.headline: Safe & Green Holdings Corp. Completes Spin-Off of Safe and Green Development Corporation
news.summary: MIAMI, Fla., September 28, 2023--Safe & Green Holdings Corp. (NASDAQ: SGBX) ("SG Holdings" or the "Company"), a leading developer, designer, and fabricator of modular structures for residential, commercial, and point-of-care medicine, today announced it has completed the spin-off of its real estate development subsidiary, Safe and Green Development Corporation (NASDAQ: SGD) ("SG DevCo"). Starting today, SG DevCo will begin "regular-way" trading on Nasdaq under the symbol "SGD."

news.headline: Safe & Green Holdings Corp. Announces Settlement in Legal Action Taken Against Select Stockholders
news.summary: MIAMI, September 27, 2023--Safe & Green Holdings Corp. (NASDAQ: SGBX) ("SG Holdings" or the "Company"), a leading developer, designer, and fabricator of modular structures for residential, commercial, and point-of-care medicine, today announced that a settlement agreement has been reached with two of its stockholders, resolving a previously announced, Company initiated litigation.

news.headline: CORNERSTONE Charitable Foundation to Build School in Ghana Funded by Safe & Green Holdings Corp. Chairman & CEO Paul Galvin; Phase 2 Expected to Include Medical Care
news.summary: MIAMI, September 21, 2023--Safe & Green Holdings Corp. (NASDAQ: SGBX) ("Safe & Green Holdings" or the "Company"), a leading developer, designer, and fabricator of modular structures for residential, commercial, and point-of-care medicine, today announced a partnership with CORNERSTONE Charitable Foundation, to construct a schoolhouse in Cape Coast, Ghana, as part of the Ghana’s Tomorrow Project.

(NASDAQ: SGBX) ("SG Holdings" or the "Company"), a leading developer, designer, and fabricator of modular structures for residential, commercial, and point-of-care medicine, today provided a further update on the planned spin-off of Safe & Green Development Corp ("SG DevCo"), the Company’s real estate development subsidiary, and the planned distribution of approximately 30% of the outstanding shares of SG DevCo common stock to SG Holdings’ s

news.headline: Safe & Green Holdings Selected by the Tunnel to Towers Foundation to Construct a Modular Home to Travel and Showcase the Foundation’s Nationwide Program
news.summary: MIAMI, September 18, 2023--Safe & Green Holdings Corp. (NASDAQ: SGBX) ("SG Holdings" or the "Company"), a leading developer, designer, and fabricator of modular structures for residential, commercial, and point-of-care medicine, announces the Tunnel to Towers Foundation has selected Safe & Green Holdings to construct a traveling modular home, the Comfort Home Show model, designed to showcase the foundation’s Homeless Veteran Program.
